text: Sredi lyudey yest' takiye, kotoryye pokupayut lozh' i boltayut vzdor o Korane lyudyam, chtoby otvernut' ikh ot islama i Korana, ne vedaya, kakiye grekhi oni sovershayut. Oni smeyutsya nad religiyey Allakha i Yego Otkroveniyem (Koranom). Podobnym lyudyam budet ugotovano unizitel'noye nakazaniye
